bs-permissionmanager-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of permission manager extension
prefs-permissionmanager:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for permission manager section in preferences.
{{Identical|Permission manager}}
bs-permissionmanager-label:
Anchor text for permission manager
{{Identical|Permission manager}}
bs-permissionmanager-grouping-global:
Column headline for namespace independent permissions
{{Identical|Namespace independent permissions}}
bs-permissionmanager-grouping-local:
Column headline for namespace specific permissions
{{Identical|Namespace specific permissions}}
bs-permissionmanager-btn-template-editor:
Button text for edit templates
{{Identical|Edit template}}
bs-permissionmanager-labeltpled:
Window title for template editor.
{{Identical|Template editor}}
bs-permissionmanager-msgtpled-savefailur: Error message for template could not be saved.
bs-permissionmanager-msgtpled-saveonabor: Message for do you want to save all data now?
bs-permissionmanager-msgtpled-deletefail: Error message for template could not be deleted.
bs-permissionmanager-titletpled-new:
Window title for create template
{{Identical|Create template}}
bs-permissionmanager-pref-lockmode: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for activate lockmode
bs-permissionmanager-pref-skipsysns: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for skip system namespaces if lockmode is active
bs-permissionmanager-pref-enablerealityc: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for activate permission check
bs-permissionmanager-pref-max-backups: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for number of maximum backups
bs-permissionmanager-unsaved-changes: Hint about data loss when a user leaves the page without saving her/his changes
bs-permissionmanager-error-lockout: Error message for changes in settings that couldn't be saved, because some essential rights are not enabled for any user group.
log-name-bs-permission-manager: Used in [[Special:Log]], title of the log type
log-description-bs-permission-manager: Used in [[Special:Log]], description of the log type
logentry-bs-permission-manager-modify:
Log message about changes in the permissions of one specific group.
Parameters:
* $4 - name of the group
apihelp-bs-permissionmanager-tasks-descr:
Describes an API endpoint that provides tasks for the PermissionManager
{{doc-apihelp-description|bs-permissionmanager-tasks}}
action-permissionmanager-viewspecialpage:
placeholder to describe that view of special page "{{int:bs-permissionmanager-label}}" is restricted for the current user.

{{Doc-action|permissionmanager-viewspecialpage}}
permissionmanager:
Anchor text for permission manager
{{Identical|Permission manager}}
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-explici:
Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is blocked by one or more groups
Parameters:
* $1 - name of the group or groups
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-inherit:
Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is inherited from one or more groups
Parameters:
* $1 - name of the group or groups
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-notset: Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is not set
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-explici: Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is explicitly set
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-setonwi: Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is set on wiki level
